Posts.Content: I understand.. I suppose my question is how on earth do I handle the anxiety ?
Posts.Title: Over testing survivors???

Posts.Content: Thanks! : ) I agree This is a new primary doctor. He is wonderful. He picked up on my post traumatic stress without me having to spell it out. I do think i need to have a discussion with him about being hyper vigilant. In other words, if there is an over zealous radiologist who looks at something that is 98% benign, but my "history" nudges them to "explore further" ...I want him to understand my emotional well being must be factored into this equation.
Posts.Title: Over testing survivors???

Posts.Content: Hi everyone!! This is my first post I am a 10 year survivor of 2 cancers I had my annual mammogram and ultra sound The ultrasound was clean but I got call back for “asymmetry” on the breast that didn’t have cancer .. they want to do a spot compression I also have a lesion on my back that they want to investigate more I feel they may be testing me to death ðŸ˜©ðŸ˜©ðŸ˜©
Posts.Title: Over testing survivors???

Posts.Content: It’s not in your head!!!! I’m 10 years out (I had a second cancer after breast cancer) I only have a few hours of energy a day before I fade out. I finally learned to honor and respect my body ... the medical profession tends to be confused by this ????
Posts.Title: Still Tired Three Years After Breast Cancer Treatment
